about_the_game:
Colorful slot machines, exciting roulette wheels and suspenseful poker games form the centerpiece of this tileset! If your game needs some high-stakes action, get this tileset.

JACKPOT! Casino Tileset Includes:

Ground tiles:

Neon water in pink, blue, and a more subdued purple
plain brown carpet
stone floor
circular pattern tile (one in brown, one in bright colors)
brick floor
wood panel
hexagon floor with neon trim
herringbone pattern
basket weave floor
diamond pattern floor
tech crystal floor
neon floor striping
glow fences
matching tables
patterned rugs

Wall tiles:

24 wall types keep things lively! Most match the floors, so you can keep your favorite pattern going.
plain stone, round pattern, brick, herringbone, tile, wood panel, checker
neon hexagon, lit strips, circular edge with neon dot roof, tech crystal walls and more!

Also includes:

roulette tables
2 styles of slot machines at different angles
blackjack tables
poker table
craps table
poker chips and cards
ATMs
computers and office supplies to make a cash-out area
bar tiles (various drinks, barrels, glasses, bar stools, cabinets, etc)
LOTS of neon signage, including blanks you can customize or localize.
plus more!

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
